---
id: _third_party_order_historyorderget
title: Query historical orders
sidebar_label: Query historical orders
description: /spot/v4/history-order
---

## 接口

**GET** `/spot/v4/history-order`

#### **Limit Flow Rules**

10/s/apikey

## 请求参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明 | 范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `symbol` | string | 否 |  | Trading pair, if not filled in, represents all |  |
| `bizType` | string | 否 |  | SPOT, LEVER |  |
| `side` | string | 否 |  | BUY,SELL |  |
| `type` | string | 否 |  | LIMIT, MARKET |  |
| `state` | string | 否 |  | `order <a href="#orderStatus">state</a>, <br> PARTIALLY_FILLED,<br> FILLED, CANCELED,<br> REJECTED,EXPIRED` |  |
| `fromId` | number | 否 |  | start id |  |
| `direction` | string | 否 |  | query direction:PREV, NEXT |  |
| `limit` | number | 否 | 20 | Limit number, max 100 |  |
| `startTime` | number | 否 |  | eg:1657682804112 |  |
| `endTime` | number | 否 |  |  |  |
| `hiddenCanceled` | bool | 否 |  |  |  |

## 示例请求

## 响应示例

### Response

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "hasPrev": true,
    "hasNext": true,
    "items": [
      //For field information, refer to the Get single interface
      {
        "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
        "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
        "clientOrderId": "16559590087220001",
        "baseCurrency": "string",
        "quoteCurrency": "string",
        "side": "BUY",
        "type": "LIMIT",
        "timeInForce": "GTC",
        "price": "40000",
        "origQty": "2",
        "origQuoteQty": "48000",
        "executedQty": "1.2",
        "leavingQty": "string",
        "tradeBase": "2",
        "tradeQuote": "48000",
        "avgPrice": "42350",
        "fee": "string",
        "feeCurrency": "string",
        "state": "NEW",
        "time": 1655958915583,
        "updatedTime": 1655958915583
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
